item.description: Looking for a supportive group to further or begin your manuscript? Then you've come to the right place! We are a group of writers, some beginners and some with professional credentials, who have finally decided to get going on our long-awaited works! We offer positive suggestions and insight -- and have a fun time doing it! Hope you can join us for a great evening of book discussion and other topics!

group.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals

item.name: The first time book writers club for non-professionals
